activities.name: Try Dive
activities.description: First diving experience guided by an instructor.
activities.requirements: Age ≥ 10. No certification required. Medical check recommended.

activities.name: Open Water
activities.description: Entry-level course including theory, pool and open water dives.

activities.name: Advanced
activities.description: Advanced course to improve diving skills and depth.
activities.requirements: Open Water certification and recent diving experience.

activities.name: Guided Dives
activities.description: Guided boat or shore dives in Benidorm.
activities.requirements: Valid diving certification and insurance if applicable.

activities.name: Gear Rental
activities.description: Diving equipment rental available for courses and trips.

activities.name: Nitrox
activities.description: Enriched air option for certified divers.
activities.requirements: Nitrox certification or enrollment in a Nitrox course.

activities.name: Snorkeling
activities.requirements: Ability to swim. Equipment included subject to availability.

location: Benidorm Commercial Port, Paseo de Colón 1 – Booth 30, Benidorm (Alicante)
